languages.text: "Отныне ты часть Кровавой паутины и помнить долж{mf|ен|на}: опасайся тщеславия. Оно оставляет прорехи в броне наших душ".

traits.locale_text: "Отныне ты часть Кровавой паутины и помнить долж{mf|ен|на}: опасайся тщеславия. Оно оставляет прорехи в броне наших душ".

languages.text: "Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."
languages.original_text: "Отныне ты часть Кровавой паутины и помнить долж{mf|ен|на}: опасайся тщеславия. Оно оставляет прорехи в броне наших душ".

traits.locale_text: "Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."
"Now that you are a Weaver, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it makes breaches in the armour of our souls."
"Now that you are a weaver, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."
"Now that you are a weaver, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."
"Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."
"Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."
"Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."

languages.text: "Nun, da Ihr Teil des Blutgesponnenen Netzes seid, hütet Euch vor der Eitelkeit. Denn sie hinterlässt klaffende Löcher in der Rüstung unserer Seelen."
languages.original_text: "Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, da Ihr Teil des Blutgesponnenen Netzes seid, hütet Euch vor der Eitelkeit. Denn sie hinterlässt klaffende Löcher in der Rüstung unserer Seelen."

languages.text: «Ahora que es parte de la Red Sanguinolenta, no olvide tener cuidado con la vanidad. Agujerea la armadura de nuestras almas».
languages.original_text: "Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que es parte de la Red Sanguinolenta, no olvide tener cuidado con la vanidad. Agujerea la armadura de nuestras almas».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの一部になったからには、今後は虚栄心には気をつけよ。それは我らの魂の鎧に裂け目を残す」
languages.original_text: "Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの一部になったからには、今後は虚栄心には気をつけよ。それは我らの魂の鎧に裂け目を残す」

languages.text: “既然您已经成为了织血罗网的成员，从今往后务必要提防虚荣之心，因为它会在我们灵魂的盔甲上留下缺口。”
languages.original_text: "Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."

traits.locale_text: “既然您已经成为了织血罗网的成员，从今往后务必要提防虚荣之心，因为它会在我们灵魂的盔甲上留下缺口。”

languages.text: « Maintenant que vous faites partie de la Toile de Sang, gardez à l'esprit que la vanité est un piège qui laisse des failles béantes dans l'armure de nos âmes. »
languages.original_text: "Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que vous faites partie de la Toile de Sang, gardez à l'esprit que la vanité est un piège qui laisse des failles béantes dans l'armure de nos âmes. »

languages.text: "Artık Kanipi Ağı'nın bir parçası olduğunuza göre kibirden kaçınmayı aklınızdan çıkarmayın. Çünkü kibir, ruhlarımızın kuşandığı zırhlarda geniş çentikler açar."
languages.original_text: "Now that you are part of the Bloodspun Web, remember henceforth to beware of vanity. For it leaves gaping rents in the armour of our souls."
